Article Title: Isro to launch its heaviest US commercial sat BlueBird-6 on December 15
Article Text:
ISRO Makes History As ‘Bahubali’ Rocket Places India’s Heaviest Communication Satellite In Orbit

NEW DELHI: In a boost to Indo-US space cooperation, Isro will launch its heaviest American commercial communication low-earth orbit satellite, the 6.5-tonne BlueBird-6, from the Sriharikota spaceport on Dec 15. Isro’s ‘Bahubali’ rocket LVM3 will put the US satellite into orbit.AST SpaceMobile, a Texas-based company that has built the space-based cellular broadband network, said, “BlueBird-6, a US licensed satellite, is scheduled to launch on Dec 15. It is the first of AST SpaceMobile’s next-generation satellites. When launched, it will feature the largest commercial phased array in low earth orbit at nearly 2,400 sqft. This represents 3.5 times increase in size over BlueBirds 1-5 and supports ten times the data capacity. ”BlueBird-6 is a “Block-2” satellite and part of a larger plan by AST SpaceMobile to deploy a series of satellites to achieve non-continuous service, with further launches scheduled through 2026. Its aim is to bridge the “digital divide” by offering fast, unhindered direct-to-device mobile broadband service in areas with poor or non-existent terrestrial network coverage.The BlueBird satellites are designed to deliver a high amount of bandwidth, with each unit capable of up to 10,000 MHz. They operate by partnering with existing mobile network carriers to enhance their networks using licensed spectrum.The BlueBird-6 satellite arrived in India from the US on Oct 19. It was later transported by road to Sriharikota for integration with launcher LVM3, fuelling and final checks ahead of its launch.The liftoff is being handled by New Space India Limited (NSIL), Isro’s commercial wing. LVM-3 had recently put India’s heaviest CMS-3 satellite, weighing 4.4 tonnes, into its orbit on Nov 2. A three-stage launch vehicle, LVM3 rocket can carry payloads weighing up to 8,000 kg to low-Earth orbit (LEO) and 4,000 kg to geosynchronous transfer orbit (GTO). The human-rated version of this vehicle will fly three Indian astronauts to space, as part of the Gaganyaan mission, which is planned for 2027.
Article Summary: Isro will launch its heaviest american commercial communication low-earth orbit satellite, the 6.5-tonne bluebird-6, from sriharikota spaceport on dec 15. Isro’s ‘bahubali’ rocket lvm3 will put the us satellite into orbit.

Article Title: Hospitality, textiles sectors set to drive jobs growth: Study
Article Text:
Textiles, apparel, and hospitality are poised for significant job growth by 2030, fueled by increased investment, a new report reveals. While manufacturing and services will also contribute, the focus is on boosting stable, salaried positions. The think tank urges a strategic approach, emphasizing skill development and addressing the informal sector's dominance to enhance labor absorption and drive economic expansion.

NEW DELHI: Textiles, apparel and hospitality could generate the strongest job growth by 2030, driven by higher investment in these sectors, according to a new report by economic policy think tank NCAER, which also called for measures to remove bottlenecks for faster expansion.Moderate growth in manufacturing and services output could raise jobs in textiles, garments and related industries by 53%, and employment in trade, hotels and similar services by 79% by 2030. While the economy displayed robust expansion in recent times, the report stated job quality did not keep pace as most employment gains came from self-employment (largely in agriculture) rather than from stable, salaried work."India's employment strategy must go beyond setting aggregrate growth target to attaining calibrated mix of demand side and supply side measures that directly incentivise labour absorption," it said.On the supply side, it called for skill development through strengthened vocational programmes, credit portability to allow students to move across institutions, deeper industry partnerships and more investment in training quality.It stated India's labour force participation rate of about 50% was low compared to other nations with the same income level, and a major challenge for growth was dominance of the informal sector.
Article Summary: Textiles, apparel, and hospitality are poised for significant job growth by 2030. While manufacturing and services will also contribute, the focus is on boosting stable, salaried positions. The think tank urges a strategic approach, emphasizing skill development and addressing the informal sector's dominance.

Article Title: $65M worth Troy Aikman takes aim at FOX leadership, blames ‘lack of communication’ for sudden departure
Article Text:
Image via AP

Troy Aikman takes shots at Fox

Also Read:

ESPN analyst and former Dallas Cowboys quarterback Troy Aikman has offered his clearest explanation yet for why he left FOX Sports after more than two decades and his comments point directly to leadership at his old network. Speaking on Sports Media with Richard Deitsch , Aikman said the move was less about chasing a bigger platform and more about how communication broke down behind the scenes.Aikman contrasted his experience at FOX with the more corporate, layered structure at ESPN. Calling ESPN “a conglomerate” and “like the U.S. government,” Aikman noted that FOX once felt far more direct and personal.“At Fox, it was really more of a mom-and-pop operation because of David Hill and Ed Gorin,” he said, describing how early network leaders handled decision-making and talent issues personally. Even after leadership changed, he said, executives like Eric Shanks and Brad Zager continued that model - at least initially.But when it came to his own contract situation in 2022, Aikman claimed that communication suddenly evaporated. Despite being one of FOX’s most recognizable faces, he said key executives did not give him clarity about his future.Aikman revealed that he never received a final offer from FOX before his move to ESPN.Instead, he said the network simply congratulated him after news broke that he had signed a new deal.“The reason that I’m no longer at Fox is mostly due to a lack of communication,” Aikman said. “Which is ironic since we’re in the communications business.”Aikman said he specifically asked FOX Sports CEO Eric Shanks about comments he’d heard regarding his contract status, but Shanks declined to address them. According to Aikman, longtime broadcasting partner Joe Buck also raised similar questions, and got the same lack of response.“I never had a conversation with Eric Shanks until he called to congratulate me on the ESPN contract,” Aikman said. “Joe had asked him the same questions… and he refused to answer.”Now ESPN’s lead NFL analyst under a reported $65 million net worth, Aikman says he enjoys the network’s scale and professionalism, even if it’s more “corporate” than FOX. He has also made headlines recently for criticizing college football’s NIL system after a UCLA recruit failed to thank him for a donation, a misunderstanding later attributed to school policy.But regarding his exit from FOX, Aikman remains firm: the issue wasn’t money or opportunity, but communication. And for one of the NFL’s most respected broadcast voices, that was the deal-breaker.
Article Summary: Troy aikman says he never received a final offer from fox before his move to espn. The former dallas cowboys quarterback says communication broke down behind the scenes. He calls espn “a conglomerate” and “like the u.s. government,” while fox once felt more personal.

Article Title: Who is Mia Sorety? OnlyFans model enters Sherrone Moore and Paige Shiver’s alleged affair drama with bold allegations against the coach
Article Text:
OnlyFans model accuses the former coach with bold claims.(Image via X)

All about the OnlyFans model, Mia Sorety , who has made new accusations against Sherrone Moore, as Paige Shiver remains silent



Why is Paige Shiver being linked to Sherrone Moore?



Sherrone Moore and Paige Shiver’s alleged affair has shocked fans across the league but now, a young OnlyFans model has come into the picture.As more and more details of Sherrone Moore and former NFL player, Jeff Shiver’s daughter, Paige Shiver’s alleged affair is being uncovered, an OnlyFans model has accused the former coach of “sliding into her DMs”.A few hours ago, a popular OnlyFans model named Mia Sorety took to X and posted, “I wasnt surprised he was all in my DMs trying to risk it all with an OF model…”While the post has sparked chaos among fans, here is everything one needs to know about the popular OnlyFans model Mia Sorety.Mia Sorety has a massive following on Instagram at around 1.7million followers and former University of Michigan coach, Sherrone Moore, turned out to be one of them.As per the OnlyFans model’s social media account, it seems she is based in Texas and is pretty regular with her updates on social media.While Mia Sorety seems to be a pretty popular OnlyFans model, she often posts bold pictures in lingerie.As soon as the OnlyFans model, Mia Sorety, took to X and accused Sherrone Moore of “sliding into her DMs”, it sparked chaos among fans.Popular sports podcast host, Justin Spiro, replied to Mia Sorety’s post as, “[She is] one of the many women he had such exchanges with…”Another fan by the username @Shea posted, “look at Cherrone Moore’s following list on instagram. The dude follows hundreds of college girls, only fan models, & female reporters/anchors. It’s crazy & obvious the dude is a cheater…”To this, Mia Sorety replied, “He surely was…”For the unversed, a few hours ago, popular coach of the University of Michigan’s football team, Sherrone Moore was fired from his position for being in “an inappropriate workplace relationship”.While the sudden firing shocked fans, many quickly linked it to former NFL player Jeff Shiver’s daughter, Paige Shiver, even though the University of Michigan has remained silent about the coach’s alleged partner.At this point, neither Sherrone Moore nor Paige Shiver has confirmed rumors about their alleged affair.Also Read: Sherrone Moore and Paige Shiver’s alleged affair takes a new turn after shocking social media post sparks chaos among fans
Article Summary: Onlyfans model accuses the former coach with bold claims. (image via x) all about the onlyfans model, mia sorety, who has made new accusations against sherrone moore, as paige shiver remains silent about their alleged affair.

Article Title: Baker Mayfield and Emily Wilkinson Combined Net Worth 2025: How much the Tampa Bay Buccaneers QB and his social media influencer wife earn
Article Text:
Baker Mayfield and Emily Wilkinson’s combined net worth (Getty Images)

Baker Mayfield and Emily Wilkinson’s combined net worth



Baker Mayfield has always lived in that unpredictable space where talent meets turbulence. Every twist in his NFL story has shaped how fans see him today. He has gone from college star to top draft pick, from being praised in Cleveland to bouncing across teams that never seemed ready to commit. Yet this winding path didn’t weaken his name. It strengthened it. It gave him a brand built on grit, confidence, and a willingness to bet on himself.That same willingness carried him through seasons where the stakes felt heavier than the spotlight. From record-breaking rookieman energy to a prove-it season in Tampa Bay worth only $4 million, Mayfield kept pushing until the league was forced to view him differently. His deals eventually reflected his climb, but what truly stands out is how his personal world grew right along with it, shaped largely by the woman who has been with him through every high and low.Money often follows influence, and together, Baker Mayfield and Emily Wilkinson bring both. Mayfield currently plays on a three-year, $100 million contract with the Buccaneers. The deal includes $50 million in total guarantees and $40 million guaranteed at signing with a $28.9 million signing bonus.His annual $33.3 million salary puts him among the highest-earning players in the league. According to reputable outlets such as Celebrity Net Worth, Baker Mayfield’s net worth in 2025 is $50 million.Wilkinson has carved her own place financially as well. Her work across bartending, patient coordination, modeling, and later influencing helped her find a steady lane long before she stepped into the NFL spotlight. Her collaborations, brand promotions, and media presence eventually built a career worth around $1 million. “Emily Wilkinson’s current net worth stands at $1 million approximately,” supported in part by an estimated $300,000 yearly income from partnerships, hair-care advice, brand deals, and work with well-known skincare companies such as Rodan+Fields. the couple's combined networth is at around $52 million.Their financial success is rooted in two very different backstories. Mayfield’s football rise began at Lake Travis High School, where he completed 429 passes for 6,255 yards with 67 touchdowns and eight interceptions. Wilkinson’s path started in Nebraska, followed by a move to Los Angeles where she juggled jobs and discovered who she wanted to be. The marriage they built in 2019 blended those paths into one steady partnership.Today, the couple shares influence that reaches beyond money. They show stability in a world that rarely hands it out freely, reminding fans that behind the touchdowns and brand deals are two people working as one through every season life sends their way.Also Read: Russell Wilson vs Ciara Net Worth: how the Giants QB’s massive career income compares to the Grammy winner’s empire
Article Summary: Baker mayfield and emily wilkinson’s combined net worth is at around $52 million. Mayfield currently plays on a three-year, $100 million contract with the buccaneers. Wilkinson's work across bartending, patient coordination, modeling, and later influencing helped her find a steady lane long before she stepped into the nfl spotlight.

Article Title: How much are Seth Rollins and Becky Lynch worth in 2025? Evaluating the WWE power couple's earnings and stats
Article Text:
Seth Rollins and Becky Lynch (Image Source: Getty)

Breaking down the couple’s combined value and individual earnings in the current WWE industry

How endorsements, personal ventures and long-term planning shape their future financial position

Seth Rollins and Becky Lynch have gradually built one of the strongest financial profiles in professional wrestling, and their combined success in 2025 reflects several years of headline billing, growing sponsorship demand, and carefully chosen outside ventures that keep expanding their reach far beyond the ring.The couple’s earning power continues rising as WWE pushes deeper into global touring markets and new media deals, giving both performers a level of exposure that reliably converts into merchandise sales, appearance fees, and long-term brand recognition.Most reliable industry evaluations place Becky Lynch’s personal net worth at roughly $7 million, supported by her multi-year WWE contract, book royalties, acting projects, and the consistently high volume of merchandise tied to her long-standing popularity, while Seth Rollins’ estimated net worth has reached nearly $12 million due to a higher base salary, extended main-event longevity, and additional income from mainstream appearances and training-academy operations.Their joint net worth is centred around $19 million in 2025, though analysts say this value increases or changes by a few dollars depending on performance bonuses based on major live events and international stadium shows.It is believed that Rollins makes nearly $3 million annually with bonus payments on the high-performing live events, and Lynch is considered to earn more than $1.5 million in a year, not counting her brand endorsements and off-WWE media appearances.Both of the superstars have diversified well beyond WWE pay schemes which serve as a stabilizer in the long-term financial position during the cycle of contracts, injury leaves, or schedule changes which are inherent parts of a wrestling career.Lynch is raking in consistent royalties with her autobiography and her television and film appeal offers secondary revenue that just fits well in WWE's responsibilities and she has a wider platform than most full-time performers. His wrestling academy in Iowa has since become a reputable training facility providing a reliable source of secondary revenue and enhancing his professional legacy by creating talent.Their social-media presence in the aggregate, with a follower base of more than 10 million people on various social-media platforms, has a significant financial implication, as it provides them with leverage of high value in brand campaigns and negotiations where the leverage is significant.As WWE continues to increase disbursement to performers with international diversification and improved broadcast agreements, both Rollins and Lynch are clearly in a position to increase their personal fortunes as the company takes increased strides into international markets and multimedia content.Also Read: Where and how to watch Saturday Night's Main Event: Complete viewing guide for John Cena's last match
Article Summary: Seth rollins and becky lynch have built one of the strongest financial profiles in professional wrestling. The couple’s earning power continues rising as wwe pushes deeper into global touring markets and new media deals. Their joint net worth is centred around $19 million in 2025, though this value increases or changes by a few dollars depending on performance bonuses.

Article Title: Who is Jeff Shiver, the father of Paige Shiver, whose name has sent cyberspace shock waves after her alleged link to Michigan HC Sherrone Moore?
Article Text:
(Image via X: Jeff Shiver, Paige Shiver, and family)

Jeff Shiver was cooking a hamburger when he got a call about joining the Chicago Bears





Sherrone Moore Fired & Arrested – Breaking Down Shocking Rumored Details with Insider Information

Jeff Shiver credits his wife Laura for his three-decade-long commitment to Bears front office

David Montgomery reminds Jeff Shiver of Matt Forte

Jeff Shiver always appreciates everyone he encounters

Also Read:

On December 10, Jon Rhoades of The Big Ten Huddle shared a swirl of rumors, much of it traced back to Justin Spiro (Host of “The Spiro Avenue Show”), who first broke news about former head coach Sherrone Moore. Spiro had been hinting since mid-August, even before the season began, that Moore could face serious trouble or even be fired by the University of Michigan. After the Ohio State game, Spiro predicted Moore’s dismissal could come within a week or as late as two months.The heart of the rumor is that Moore was fired due to an alleged relationship with Paige Shiver, his executive assistant, who was promoted when Moore took over for Jim Harbaugh. Now, the latest twist claims Shiver is pregnant and that Moore is confirmed as the father. Paige Shiver’s news has sent shock waves through cyberspace. But Shiver’s ties to football run deeper than college sidelines. She is the daughter of Jeff Shiver, a respected NFL scout. To understand her father’s story, let’s revisit Dan Pompei’s 2019 biographical interview in The Athletic.On a spring day in 1987, Jeff Shiver was flipping a hamburger in his Lafayette, Indiana, kitchen when the phone rang with a call that would change his life.Bill Tobin, the Chicago Bears’ personnel chief, was on the line, offering Shiver a chance to join the NFL’s scouting ranks. At the time, Shiver was earning $18,000 a year as a BLESTO scout, but Tobin’s offer of $25,000 felt like striking gold. Shiver eagerly accepted, feeling as if he had just won the lottery.As they sealed the deal with a handshake, Tobin promised, “You’re going to be with the Bears a long time.” More than three decades later, Shiver is still a fixture in Chicago, outlasting every other personnel man in the team’s hundred-year history. Only Scott DiStefano has served (five years) longer as a continuously employed NFL scout for the Denver Broncos. From fullback Brad Muster in 1988 to running back David Montgomery in 2019, Shiver has played a role in every Bears draft pick.“Jeff worked out even better than I thought,” Tobin said via The Athletic in 2019. “He’s a wonderful person and damn good scout. He’s been a giant in the scouting industry.”“I think the world of him,” said former Bears general manager Jerry Angelo. “I don’t know of anybody more respected and or revered in the scouting business than Jeff. I saw it from afar when I was with other teams, and I saw it firsthand when I got to Chicago. Whatever he says, you can take it to the bank.”Shiver credits his impeccable endurance to his faith and to Laura, his wife of 34 years (at the time of the 2019 The Athletic interview, now they’ve been together for roughly 40 long years). “It’s a hard job,” Shiver said. “To be able to do it begins with a great wife. Not once did I walk in the front door and hear her complain about me not being there.”Laura’s patience is all the more monumental given that Shiver spends up to 275 nights a year away from home, crisscrossing the country in his Ford Edge and tallying about 30,000 miles annually. Life on the road has brought him moments of pure bliss, like hearing, “Honey, I think I’m pregnant,” and heartache, like learning, “Your brother-in-law was in a car accident, and he didn’t make it.” His fondest travel memories are the late-night phone calls from his young children, Brittany, John, Paige, and Nicole, soft voices asking, “Dad, when are you coming home?”The former Bears general manager, Ryan Pace, told The Athletic in 2019 that Shiver’s experience on the staff is invaluable. Think about the relationships he’s built and the resources he has. He can call people and get information that a younger scout can’t. He also has a mental library of players.In a draft meeting, he’ll quickly point out when one player reminds him of another and explain why. Sometimes, he’ll mention players from way back that nobody else remembers. David Montgomery reminds Shiver a bit of Matt Forte. He does a great job of describing players. He has a million one-liners that make everyone laugh. He brings passion and energy while keeping things fun.Rod Graves, the former Bears personnel director, told The Athletic in 2019 that he always relied on Jeff for core evaluation. He would be shocked if Ryan (Pace) and those who followed did not lean on Jeff in the same way. Shiver was the definition of dependability, an astute evaluator, and someone Graves trusted without a doubt. Few people ranked higher on his list, both as friends and as professionals. Graves has only praise for Shiver and says with complete honesty that he loves the man.Dan Pompei of The Athletic revealed in 2019 that one of the earliest and most profound lessons Shiver absorbed as an NFL scout was to appreciate everyone he encountered, not just those with influence or something to offer. He made it a point to value the everyday people: the gas station attendant, the custodian, the security guard. Shiver’s philosophy was simple: the mission never outweighs the people you meet along the way: “The mission never is greater than the people you come in contact with. ”Pompei also painted a picture of Shiver’s upbringing, shaped by his late parents, John and Myrtle. Jeff inherited his strong work ethic from his father, who spent over 80 years as an auto mechanic at Shiver’s Auto Service, often working twelve-hour days, six days a week. During World War II, John served as a flight engineer and gunner in the Army Air Corps. Meanwhile, Myrtle managed the books and cared for Jeff and his two sisters.Talking to Pompei in 2019, Jeff said he still feels his mother’s love when he bakes her Sour Cream Pound Cake. And when the call came that brought him to the Bears’ front office, he was in the middle of cooking a hamburger. Distracted by the life-changing news, he burned it, but as he told Pompei, it was still the best burger he ever tasted: “By far, the best burger I ever tasted.”Jeff Shiver currently serves as Executive Scout for the Chicago Bears.
Article Summary: Jeff shiver has been with the chicago bears for more than three decades. He has played a role in every bears draft pick since 1988. Shiver credits his impeccable endurance to his faith and to his wife of 34 years. Jeff shiver currently serves as executive scout for the chicago bears.

Article Title: Is Paige Shiver single? Exploring the personal life of the NFL veteran's daughter whose name is being linked to Sherrone Moore firing saga
Article Text:
Paige Shiver and Sherrone Moore (Via X and Getty Images)

Paige Shiver’s personal life: What we know so far





Whispers around the Michigan football program have grown louder in recent days, pulling one name into the center of a storm she never addressed publicly. Paige Shiver, a staff member in the University of Michigan athletic department, has become the subject of widespread speculation after social media users connected her to the “inappropriate relationship” that led to the dismissal of head coach Sherrone Moore. As the rumors circulated, her online activity drew even more attention, especially when her accounts went quiet during the height of the discussion. The university has not identified the staff member involved, but curiosity online has only increased.This sudden spotlight has pushed Shiver, who rarely appeared in public conversations about the team, into a narrative she has never confirmed. According to Larry Brown Sports, Shiver is listed as the “Executive Assistant” to the head coach, a role that naturally placed her near program operations. When Moore was fired on December 10, 2025, after officials cited an “inappropriate relationship,” speculation quickly turned toward anyone who worked closely with him. Although none of the allegations have been verified, the internet filled the silence with theories, further magnifying Shiver’s name.According to Larry Brown Sports, Paige Shiver was promoted to Sherrone Moore’s executive assistant in 2024 after serving as an on-campus recruiting staffer.She joined Michigan in November 2021 and, over time, became a familiar presence within football operations. Her family has deep roots in the sport. Her father, Jeff Shiver, is a long-time scout for the Chicago Bears, and her uncle, Emerson Kampen III, is known for his work in basketball analysis.Paige Shiver’s education traces back to Purdue University, where she built a foundation in nonprofit and athletic administration. Before moving into college sports, she worked in development, marketing, and fundraising for the Muscular Dystrophy Association. A feature published by the Chicago Bears in 2016 also revealed that she has Pompe Disease, a rare progressive disorder requiring weekly treatments that changed her athletic lifestyle.The attention surrounding her name grew once reports noted that her Instagram account became private and her X and LinkedIn profiles were deactivated on December 10, 2025. Neither she nor Moore has commented on the claims that tied them to an alleged affair or the rumor involving a pregnancy and abortion. With no confirmation from any official source, the claims remain unverified. Her personal life, including her dating history, also remains unknown, leaving much of the conversation built on speculation rather than facts.Also Read: Why Sherrone Moore ended up in police custody amid Michigan firing him for alleged ‘inappropriate relationship’ scandal
Article Summary: Paige shiver is a staff member in the university of michigan athletic department. She has become the subject of widespread speculation after social media users connected her to the “inappropriate relationship” that led to the dismissal of head coach sherrone moore. The university has not identified the staff member involved.

Article Title: Lego Fortnite Ninjago update: Maintenance schedule, servers, launch timings, and more
Article Text:
Image via Lego Fortnite/Epic Games

LEGO Fortnite Ninjago update release date



Server downtime and maintenance schedule

Downtime begins: 4:00 AM ET

Matchmaking ends shortly before downtime

Expected duration: Approximately 2 hours

Estimated return time: Around 6:00 AM ET

Global launch timings for all regions

North America (PT) - 4:00 AM - Dec 11, 2025

North America (ET) - 7:00 AM - Dec 11, 2025

United Kingdom (GMT) - 12:00 PM - Dec 11, 2025

Europe (CET) - 1:00 PM - Dec 11, 2025

Brazil (BRT) - 9:00 AM - Dec 11, 2025

Japan (JST) - 9:00 PM - Dec 11, 2025

Australia (AEDT) - 11:00 PM - Dec 11, 2025

New LEGO biomes and structures

Fresh survival and crafting mechanics

Story-driven Ninjago quests

Skins for Kai, Zane, Jay, and Cole

Additional heroes such as Wu, Lloyd, and Nya arriving in a later wave

Also Read:

The highly anticipated LEGO Fortnite Odyssey x Ninjago update is finally rolling out as part of the v39.10 patch, marking one of the biggest expansions to the LEGO Fortnite mode since its launch in 2024. Following months of leaks, teaser images, and community speculation, Epic Games has now confirmed the complete rollout schedule, server downtime details, and global timing for the collaboration.The update brings new biomes, environments, challenges, and the arrival of iconic Ninjago heroes. Here is everything players need to know before the update goes live.The LEGO Fortnite Ninjago content is officially set to release on Thursday, December 11, 2025, in sync with Fortnite Chapter 7’s first major update. The collaboration introduces “NINJAGO: Rise of the Ninja,” allowing players to explore Ninjago Island, master elemental powers, and unlock Spinjitzu abilities as part of the evolving storyline.Epic Games has also confirmed that a second wave of Ninjago content will arrive in 2026, expanding the crossover further.To deploy the v39.10 update, Epic Games will temporarily take Fortnite offline for maintenance. Here are the key details:During this period, players will not be able to access any Fortnite modes, including Battle Royale, Zero Build, LEGO Fortnite, or Creative.Epic has noted that downtime durations can vary depending on backend adjustments.Because v39.10 is a synchronized global patch, unlock times differ by region. Based on Epic’s projected rollout window, here’s when players can expect to jump into the update:These timings may shift slightly depending on how quickly servers stabilize once maintenance concludes.What to expect in the new update?The collaboration will introduce a full range of Ninjago-themed content, including:Players can use the Ninjago outfits not only in LEGO Fortnite Odyssey but also in Battle Royale and Zero Build.With its new world elements, storyline expansion, and collectible cosmetics, the LEGO Fortnite x Ninjago update is expected to be one of the most significant additions of the season. More details will be available once the v39.10 patch is fully live.
Article Summary: The highly anticipated lego fortnite odyssey x ninjago update is finally rolling out as part of the v39.10 patch. Epic games has confirmed the complete rollout schedule, server downtime details, and global timing for the collaboration. The update brings new biomes, environments, challenges, and the arrival of iconic ninjago heroes.

Article Title: George Kittle and Claire Kittle combined net worth in 2025: NFL star, career, family, business, and more
Article Text:
George Kittle and Claire Kittle combined net worth in 2025: NFL star, career, family, business, and more (Image via Getty)

George Kittle nfl career and earnings

Claire Kittle fitness business and family life



George Kittle and Claire Kittle income sources

George Kittle is a star tight end in the NFL, and he plays for the San Francisco 49ers. His wife, Claire Kittle, is a fitness coach and business owner. Fans love them because they work hard, stay close, and share happy family moments. In 2025, their combined net worth is about $22 million, with George earning most of it from football and Claire earning from her fitness work.George Kittle joined the San Francisco 49ers in 2017. He became one of the best tight ends in the league because of his big plays, strong catches, and leadership. In 2020, he signed a five-year deal worth $75 million, which was the biggest contract for a tight end at that time, as confirmed by the NFL and the 49ers.George also works with big brands like Nike and Bud Light, which adds more money to his income. His net worth in 2025 is about $20 million, based on his contract and brand earnings. In recent 2025 games, George made long catches and scored touchdowns that helped the 49ers in key moments.Claire Kittle is a fitness trainer and business owner. She runs her own fitness and wellness brand, where she teaches people to stay active and healthy.Claire also shares workout videos, food tips, and daily life moments with fans.George Kittle and Claire Kittle met in college at the University of Iowa. They got engaged in 2019 and were married that same year. Her business brings steady income from online coaching and brand partnerships. In 2025, Claire Kittle’s net worth is about $2 million, based on her growing fitness work.Most of the couple’s money comes from George’s NFL contract and brand ads. He also earns from his podcast and events. Claire earns from her fitness brand, coaching plans, and health partnerships. Together, they work hard and make smart choices that help them grow their money. Their teamwork makes their careers and business even stronger.In 2025, the couple co-hosted a podcast episode featuring other athletes and discussed sports, as well as funny anecdotes about their family life. The fans responded positively to their down-to-earth personalities.In 2025, George Kittle and Claire Kittle have a combined net worth of about $22 million. Their story shows hard work, love, and support in both sports and business.Also Read: George And Claire Kittle Invite Erin And Filip Forsberg To Their Podcast And Sort San Francisco 49ers As Harry Potter Characters
Article Summary: In 2025, george kittle and claire kittle have a combined net worth of about $22 million. George earns most of it from football and claire earns from her fitness work. Their story shows hard work, love, and support in both sports and business. Together, they work hard and make smart choices that help them grow their money.

Article Title: After losing more than $70 billion, Mark Zuckerberg seems to have finally admitted that his biggest bet is 'not working'
Article Text:
$70 billion in losses and counting

Layoffs may be coming to Meta

Meta’s Secret AI Army: Top Talent Hired from OpenAI, Google & More







Where Metaverse budget cuts may go

Wall Street says: We are with you on this

Meta reportedly delays MR glasses

The day Facebook changed its name to Meta

To build the Metaverse'





Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg seems to have finally realised that one of the company's biggest bets—Metaverse—is not working (or not working as expected). It is also the technology that the company changed its very name after. In 2021, after 17 years of being called Facebook, the social networking parent company behind Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp and Oculus changed its name to Meta. Now according to a report from Bloomberg, Meta is likely to slash its Reality Labs budget, shaving off as much as 30%. The proposed metaverse cuts are reportedly part of the company's annual budget planning for 2026, which included a series of meetings at Zuckerberg's compound in Hawaii last month.For those unaware, Metaverse unit works on virtual reality headsets and a VR-based social network, which produces the company's Quest mixed-reality headsets, smart glasses made with EssilorLuxottica's Ray-Ban and upcoming augmented-reality glasses. Meta has struggled to sell its vision of an immersive metaverse of interconnected virtual worlds and expand the market for its devices beyond the niche of the gaming community.Analysts see the move reflecting the overall lack of interest in products like Meta’s social virtual reality platform Horizon Worlds, as well as its virtual reality hardware—both in the industry at large, as well as among consumers.Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s Metaverse vision has posted more than $70 billion in losses over the past four years. Little doubt then that Facebook parent's shares rose 4% as the move eased some investor jitters over a bet that CEO Mark Zuckerberg has backed with billions of dollars. "Smart move, just late," told Huber Research Partners analyst Craig Huber to Bloomberg. He added, "This seems a major shift to align costs with a revenue outlook that surely is not as prosperous as management thought years ago. "So, what may really be troubling Metaverse? No one can really pinpoint. But as a report in Fortune says, for many people, the problem is that the value proposition is unclear; Metaverse simply doesn’t yet deliver a must-have reason to ditch their smartphones or laptops.Reality Labs is made up of a Metaverse unit and a wearables unit. Within the Metaverse unit, executives are reportedly considering making cuts to VR jobs. As the report says, cuts in resources that high are most likely to include layoffs as early as January.The report comes as Meta scrambles to stay relevant in Silicon Valley's artificial-intelligence race after its Llama 4 model met with a poor reception. To fuel its ambitious goals, Meta has committed as much as $72 billion in capital spending this year. The company reorganized its AI efforts under Superintelligence Labs earlier this year, with Zuckerberg said to be personally leading an aggressive talent acquisition, floating offers for startups and directly courting prospects on WhatsApp with million-dollar pay packages. In fact, Meta's big hiring is said to have triggered a talent war in the Silicon Valley.Last month, Meta Platforms said that it will invest $600 billion in the US infrastructure and jobs over the next three years, including artificial intelligence data centers. Meta has doubled down on AI, with a target of achieving superintelligence. Zuckerberg said Meta is building compute because "it's the right strategy to aggressively front-load capacity so we're prepared for the most optimistic cases," on the company's recent earnings call. Meta has forecast "notably larger" capital expenses next year thanks to investments in artificial intelligence, including aggressively building data centers to power its AI push.Incidentally, earlier this week, Zuckerberg announced that Alan Dye, a longtime designer at Apple, is joining Meta to lead a new creative studio inside the Reality Labs division that would focus on design, fashion and technology. Dye will report to Andrew Bosworth, Meta’s chief technology officer, who leads Reality Labs. “We’re entering a new era where A.I. glasses and other devices will change how we connect with technology and each other,” Mr. Zuckerberg said in a post to Threads. “With this new studio, we’re focused on making every interaction thoughtful, intuitive, and built to serve people.”Wall Street sent a clear signal to Meta Platforms that it wants the company to reduce spending on Reality Labs. Wall Street is sending a clear signal to Meta Platforms that it wants the company to reduce spending on Reality Labs. Meta Platforms shares jumped 3.4% on reports that the company was cutting Metaverse spending in favor of AI and smart glasses.Meta has reportedly delayed the launch of its Mixed Reality Glasses (MR Glasses) from the second half of 2026 to the first half of 2027. According to a report in Business Insider, Meta executives announced the delay after meetings with CEO Mark Zuckerberg is said to have told the team to take more time to make the business sustainable and deliver higher quality experiences. The company’s Metaverse leaders Gabriel Aul and Ryan Cairns reportedly told team that the delay is “going to give us a lot more breathing room to get the details right. ”Facebook already sells VR headsets and Ray-Ban smart glasses. The form factor of Meta's upcoming Glasses will reportedly be similar to that of Apple Vision Pro, with may be more power.In October 2021, after 17 years of being called Facebook, the social networking giant behind Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp and Oculus got a new name. Facebook’s corporate entity became Meta. Mark Zuckerberg announced the change at the company’s AR/VR-focused Connect event, sharing that the new title captured more of the company’s core ambition: '. Analysts saw name change as the right move, as Instagram was -- and continues to be -- more valuable than Facebook. Along with WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger, the four apps are known as Meta's Family of Apps. The name change to Meta Platforms is also said to have reflected an increased emphasis on engaging through virtual worlds. Incidentally, the name change to Meta from Facebook was followed by a sharp decline in company's stock price, which fell 64.2% in 2022 compared to a 33.1% decrease in the Nasdaq that year.
Article Summary: $70 billion in losses and counting.layoffs may be coming to meta. The proposed metaverse cuts are reportedly part of the company's annual budget planning for 2026. Within the metaverse unit, executives are reportedly considering making cuts to vr jobs.

Article Title: PlayStation 2025 Wrap-Up now live: Here’s how to check your PS gaming report card
Article Text:
PlayStation gamers can now dive into their 2025 Wrap-Up, revealing total hours played and top games. This annual recap, live until January 8, 2026, offers detailed insights into gaming habits, including genre preferences and trophy achievements. Players can also earn a free avatar and shareable cards. While some miss past detailed breakdowns, the experience highlights popular titles and upcoming blockbusters.

Your PlayStation gaming year by the numbers





PlayStation gamers can now access their personalized 2025 Wrap-Up statistics, revealing exactly how many hours they spent gaming this year and which titles dominated their playtime.The annual recap went live December 9 and runs through January 8, 2026, offering PS5 and PS4 players detailed breakdowns of their gaming habits. To qualify, users must have played at least 10 hours between January 1 and December 31, 2025, and enabled data collection on their consoles.The Wrap-Up delivers comprehensive statistics including top games and genres, single-player versus multiplayer hours, trophy achievements, and PlayStation Plus membership details. This year's edition also tracks accessory usage—showing time spent with PlayStation VR2, PlayStation Portal, and preferred DualSense controller designs.Players completing the experience earn a free glass-themed avatar and can download shareable summary cards showcasing their year in gaming. The dashboard continues updating through December 31, making a return visit before the January deadline worthwhile for complete statistics.Hit titles like Ghost of Yōtei, Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, and Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 topped many players' most-played lists. However, some longtime users report this year's Wrap-Up feels lighter on details compared to previous versions, notably missing the month-by-month breakdowns that made earlier editions more engaging.The recap mirrors similar year-end traditions from Spotify and other platforms, transforming raw data into shareable moments. With blockbusters like Grand Theft Auto 6 and Resident Evil Requiem scheduled for 2026, next year's statistics promise even more dramatic gaming tallies.Visit wrapup.playstation.com to check your 2025 PlayStation report card before the January 8 deadline.
Article Summary: Playstation gamers can now dive into their 2025 wrap-up, revealing total hours played and top games. This annual recap, live until january 8, 2026, offers detailed insights into gaming habits. Players can also earn a free avatar and shareable cards.

Article Title: Phoebe Gates gets $30 million for Phia, that made father Bill Gates say: When your daughter asks if you’d be willing to work a shift in …
Article Text:
“I’ve entered the startup world again…When your daughter asks if you’d be willing to work a shift in customer service at her startup, the only right answer is yes.

I’ve spent a lot of time thinking about how technology can make systems more efficient, equitable, and accessible.

But I’ve learned over the years that the best way to understand how something works, or where it breaks, is to go straight to the people using it.

That’s why I’ll be joining the Phia customer experience team for a day this week. Phia is a fashion-tech tool built to make shopping smarter and more sustainable, and it’s the brainchild of my daughter Phoebe Gates and her co-founder

Sophia Kianni

.

They’ve built an app and browser extension that helps people shop smarter by finding the best prices, surfacing secondhand options, and showing lower-impact alternatives across thousands of online retailers.

It’s been inspiring to watch them tackle a massive challenge, rethinking the way we shop, by meeting users where they are.

And now, I’ll be doing the same.

Looking forward to getting back into the startup scene. Hopefully, I won’t break anything (no promises).

📲Download the Phia iOS app for free at join.phia.com

💻Or if you shop on your computer like me, they have a free chrome extension at gophia.com

Let me know what you think! You never know who’s on the other end of the customer service line…”

How the latest funding round will help Phoebe Gates Phia app

“There are enough clothes on the planet for the next six generations. We don’t need to buy new clothes.

The rise in secondhand fashion is really exciting. We just need to make it a lot easier for consumers.”





Microsoft founder Bill Gates ' daughter Phoebe Gates has raised $30 million funding for her artificial intelligence (AI) shopping startup, Phia. The new funding values the company at $180 million. However, Phoebe Gates’ father has yet to invested in the venture. Instead, the Bill Gates donated his time and experience to her daughter’s startup. Earlier this year, the tech billionaire took to professional networking site LinkedIn to announce that he was doing a customer service shift to support the team in the days following the launch of the app. He said when a daughter asks for help at her startup, the only right answer is yes.In his LinkedIn post, Bill Gates shared a short clip offering a glimpse of his shift working in the customer service department of his daughter’s app. He wrote:The latest round of funding is a massive leap in value for Phoebe Gates' startup, coming just months after the New York-based company finished its first fundraising round. It will make the startup one of the most-watched companies in the booming AI market.The company has attracted a long list of famous backers. According to a pitch deck viewed by Bloomberg, investors include Hailey Bieber, Kris Jenner, Sheryl Sandberg, and Spanx founder Sara Blakely.Phia has been designed to serve as an intelligent shopping assistant. Its being offered as an AI agent that will fix the messy online shopping experience. According to the company, customers usually struggle to find what they want and companies end up advertising to people who aren’t interested and Phia will be able to resolve it.As a computer and mobile phone browser extension, Phia searches for products, price comparisons, and real-time discounts to help users in their buying decisions. Second-hand options are also highlighted by Phia to further assist people in shopping more 'green'.Explaining her startup's objective, Phoebe Gates said to Elle:The new financial round is being led by major investment firms, including Notable Capital, Kleiner Perkins, and Khosla Ventures; investors with a history of supporting giants in the tech sector, such as Airbnb.Phia has been downloaded 750,000 times in just eight months. The idea by Phoebe Gates and her co-founder Sophia Kianni was born while living in a Stanford dorm room; the initial plans were to make a smart tampon but later changed to fashion technology.A $250,000 grant from a Stanford social entrepreneurship program enabled them to work on the project full time and eventually move to New York. Kianni also took a break from her studies so that she could quickly learn everything about the industry they were going to work in, she told Vogue.Earlier, Phoebe Gates told Elle that when she first floated the idea to her parents, Bill and Melinda Gates, they urged her to treat it as a side project. She followed their advice by joining Stanford's night program after relocating to New York and completing her degree in 2024.
Article Summary: Bill gates' daughter phoebe gates has raised $30 million funding for her artificial intelligence (ai) shopping startup, phia. The new funding values the company at $180 million. Earlier this year, the tech billionaire took to professional networking site linkedin to announce that he was doing a customer service shift to support the team in the days following the launch of the app.

Article Title: NYT Connections today’s hints and answers (#913) for 10 December 2025
Article Text:
What is NYT Connections





NYT Connections: Hints for today’s puzzle



Yellow Group: Surprised expression

Green Group: Unreal

Blue Group: A treat

Purple Group: The letter after X

NYT Connections categories for December 10, 2025



Yellow Group: Words you might say in surprise or shock.

Green Group: Words related to imitation or copying.

Blue Group: Words for sweet treats or candies.

Purple Group: Words that start with the letter Y.

NYT Connections answers for December 10, 2025

Yellow Group: DEAR, GRACIOUS, HEAVENS, MERCY

Green Group: COPY, DUMMY, DUPE, FAKE

Blue Group: CANDY, LOLLY, SUCKER, SWEET

Purple Group: WHY, YEAR, YELLOW, YES

NYT Connections related FAQs



How do I play the game?

Are hints available?

Can I play NYT Connections for free?

What skills does the game improve?





The New York Times’ Connections has quickly become a favourite among word puzzle enthusiasts, blending the addictive simplicity of Wordle with more complex challenges in logic and pattern recognition. Each day, players face 16 seemingly random words arranged in a 4x4 grid, tasked with sorting them into four distinct thematic groups. Success depends on identifying subtle connections, associations, and clever wordplay, making the game both fun and mentally stimulating. For puzzle lovers looking to test their skills, the December 10, 2025 edition (game #913) offers an ideal mix of challenge and insight, encouraging lateral thinking, careful observation, and strategic reasoning. Connections continues to captivate a global audience as a daily exercise in cognitive skill and mental agility.NYT Connections is a captivating word association game designed to test analytical thinking, lateral reasoning, and cognitive flexibility. Unlike standard word games, players must detect subtle links between words, which can range from obvious to highly nuanced or abstract. The game is freely available on mobile devices and desktop platforms, allowing enthusiasts to play anytime, anywhere, at their convenience.Its combination of easy-to-understand mechanics, challenging puzzles, and complex problem-solving has turned it into a daily ritual for many. The game’s structure encourages players to sharpen their pattern recognition, develop strategic thinking, improve memory retention, and enjoy a mental workout while having fun.To assist players without giving away the answers directly, here are strategic hints for December 10, 2025:These hints guide players toward recognising patterns, encouraging logical deduction and strategic grouping without removing the challenge entirely.Check below the today's NYT Connections categories to solve the puzzle:For those ready to review their solutions or learn from the puzzle logic, the complete answers for game #913 are:Connections continues to captivate players worldwide, turning each puzzle into a thrilling hunt for hidden patterns, where every correct grouping sparks a moment of “aha!” and keeps the mind sharp for the next challenge.Words are presented in a 4x4 grid. Identify patterns or associations to sort them into four correct categories.Yes, the game provides subtle hints to guide players without revealing the answers outright.Yes, it is available for free on both mobile devices and desktop platforms.It sharpens pattern recognition, logical thinking, lateral reasoning, and problem-solving skills.
Article Summary: Connections is a captivating word association game designed to test analytical thinking, lateral reasoning, and cognitive flexibility. Unlike standard word games, players must detect subtle links between words, which can range from obvious to highly nuanced or abstract.

Article Title: TCS Layoffs: Maharashtra labour minister Aakash Fundkar gives written reply in Vidhan Parishad on TCS layoffs
Article Text:
TCS layoffs: Legislative concerns

TCS HR chief Sudeep Kunnumal on layoffs in future





Maharashtra labour minister Aakash Fundkar has now informed that the state legislative council that around 376 employees of Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) were laid off at the company’s Pune campuses over the past two quarters of the current fiscal year. The disclosure was made via a hand written reply during the Vidhan Parishad session, after concerns were raised by members over reports of widespread layoffs in the IT sector.Fundkar further clarified that the layoffs were not linked to artificial intelligence or automation, addressing speculation that job losses were part of a broader restructuring driven by new technologies. In the Vidhan Parishad, Fundkar revealed that the company fired 376 employees from its Pune campus and the round of layoffs mainly impacted middle and senior-level managers.As reported by new agency PTI, during the Question Hour, the legislators including Uma Khare and Prasad Lad raised questions about increasing job losses in the technology sector and the impact of AI adoption on employment. The reply by the minister is sought to provide transparency by citing official data received directly from TCS.The Maharashtra government also stressed in the fact that while the layoffs have occurred, they are not on the scale suggested by media reports of mass layoffs across multiple cities.The minister further assured the council that the government is monitoring developments in the IT sector closely, given its importance to employment and state’s economy.Recently, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) HR head Sudeep Kunnumal recently addressed concerns over potential layoffs at the IT giant. Speaking during the company’s Q2 earnings call earlier this month, Kunnumal said that TCS is not “chasing a target” when it comes to job cuts. Instead, the IT firm said it will evaluate “everyone”.During the earnings call, analyst Surendra Goyal from Citi asked: “The (second) question is with the release of 1% workforce, the headcount declined by 20,000 people or 3%. And what you had announced earlier was 2%. So should we expect a similar kind of head count reduction in the next quarter as well?”TCS HR head Sudeep Kunnumal replied to the question saying: “So almost -- see, the 20,000 head count is a factor of voluntary and involuntary attrition. So you should see that. But as we announced, against the 2 percentage, we have midway, so we have done approximately 1 percentage of it. And like what Krithi just mentioned, we don't have a target.”
Article Summary: Around 376 employees of tata consultancy services (tcs) were laid off at the company’s pune campuses over the past two quarters of the current fiscal year. The disclosure was made via a hand written reply during the vidhan parishad session.

Article Title: Hinge CEO Justin McLeod exits to launch AI dating app Overtone
Article Text:
Leadership transition at Hinge

Launch of Overtone





Hinge founder and CEO Justin McLeod has announced that he is stepping down from his position and will launch a new venture — Overtone. McLeod revealed that Overtone is an AI-driven dating platform spun out of the Match Group. As part of the transition, Jackie Jantos, currently Hinge's president and chief marketing officer, has been promoted to chief executive officer. McLeod, who founded Hinge in 2011, will remain an advisor to Hinge through March to support the transition. Match Group will continue to invest in Hinge's momentum and in Overtone's development as part of its strategy to shape the future of the category through responsible AI and real-world outcomes.As CEO, Jackie Jantos will lead Hinge into its next phase of growth, building on four years of leadership across brand, culture, and product strategy. Under her tenure as President and CMO, Hinge expanded into Europe and Latin America, introduced new product innovations rooted in user insights, and strengthened its cultural relevance with Gen Z, which now represents Hinge's largest audience globally."Justin has been an extraordinary innovator and world-class founder, taking Hinge from an early idea to a global leader in intentional dating," said Spencer Rascoff, CEO of Match Group."We're proud to have incubated Overtone within Hinge and to now lead its funding round as he builds his next venture. With a strong foundation and leadership team in place, Hinge is poised for its next chapter under Jackie's leadership, focused on continued growth and innovation. ""Building Hinge has been the privilege of my life, and I'm incredibly proud of what the team has created," said McLeod. "The company's momentum, including being on track to reach $1 billion in revenue by 2027, gives me full confidence in where Hinge is headed. I'm grateful for Spencer and Match Group's continued support and excited for what comes next."McLeod revealed that his new company — Overtone will work independently but will get strategic support from Match Group. The dating app is said to useAI-powered personalization to improve matchmaking, focusing on deeper compatibility and conversational chemistry rather than surface-level swipes.According to McLeod, Overtone will use advanced AI to help users craft more authentic profiles and generate meaningful introductions. The platform is designed to reduce the friction of online dating by offering smarter suggestions and context-aware interactions.Match Group plans to lead Overtone's initial funding round in early 2026 and hold a substantial ownership position.
Article Summary: Hinge founder and ceo justin mcleod has announced that he is stepping down from his position and will launch a new venture — overtone. Overtone is an ai-driven dating platform spun out of the match group. Mcleod, who founded hinge in 2011, will remain an advisor to hinge through march to support the transition.

Article Title: Sam Altman says industry is wrong on OpenAI's competition, it is not from Google, but ...
Article Text: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has declared Apple its ultimate rival, shifting focus from AGI to device-centric AI. A 'code red' memo halts moonshot projects to boost ChatGPT's performance, driven by aggressive talent raids from Apple. Meanwhile, Google's Gemini surges, forcing OpenAI to prioritize mass-market appeal and user feedback to regain dominance.
Article Summary: Openai ceo sam altman has declared apple its ultimate rival, shifting focus from agi to device-centric ai. A 'code red' memo halts moonshot projects to boost chatgpt's performance. Meanwhile, google's gemini surges, forcing openai to prioritize mass-market appeal and user feedback to regain dominance.

Article Title: OpenAI launches GPT 5.2 with advanced capabilities, to compete with Google’s Gemini 3
Article Text:
Coding with GPT 5.2





ChatGPT-maker OpenAI has launched GPT-5.2 artificial intelligence model, days after CEO Sam Altman issued an internal "code red" pausing internal projects and redirecting teams to accelerate development. This comes as a response to Google 's Gemini 3 that was launched last month. Announcing the new model, OpenAI said “We designed GPT‑5.2 to unlock even more economic value for people; it’s better at creating spreadsheets, building presentations, writing code, perceiving images, understanding long contexts, using tools, and handling complex, multi-step projects.”As revealed by the company, the new models is aimed to bring more economic value for users.“GPT‑5.2 Thinking sets a new state-of-the-art score, and is our first model that performs at or above a human expert level. Specifically, GPT‑5.2 Thinking beats or ties top industry professionals on 70.9% of comparisons on GDPval knowledge work tasks, according to expert human judges. These tasks include making presentations, spreadsheets, and other artifacts,” the company said.OpenAI says that GPT‑5.2 Thinking sets a new state of the art of 55.6% on SWE-Bench Pro, a rigorous evaluation of real-world software engineering.Unlike SWE-bench Verified, which only tests Python, SWE-Bench Pro tests four languages and aims to be more contamination-resistant, challenging, diverse, and industrially relevant.On SWE-bench Verified (not plotted), GPT‑5.2 Thinking scored 80%, as claimed by the AI maker. “For everyday professional use, this translates into a model that can more reliably debug production code, implement feature requests, refactor large codebases, and ship fixes end-to-end with less manual intervention,” it said.OpenAI further claims GPT‑5.2 Thinking hallucinates less than GPT‑5.1 Thinking. On a set of de-identified queries from ChatGPT, responses with errors were 30%rel less common. For professionals, this means fewer mistakes when using the model for research, writing, analysis, and decision support—making the model more dependable for everyday knowledge work.
Article Summary: Chatgpt-maker openai has launched gpt-5.2 artificial intelligence model. Ceo sam altman issued an internal "code red" pausing internal projects and redirecting teams to accelerate development. This comes as a response to google's gemini 3 that was launched last month.
